mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(scheduleno, sdate, label, title, content, seqno, regdate, memberno) VALUES (schedule_seq.nextval, #{sdate}, #{label}, #{title}, #{content}, 1, sysdate, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT scheduleno, sdate, label, title, content, seqno, regdate, memberno FROM schedule ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT scheduleno, sdate, label, seqno FROM schedule WHERE SUBSTR(sdate, 1, 7) = #{sdate} ORDER BY sdate ASC, seqno ASC
SELECT scheduleno, sdate, label, seqno FROM schedule WHERE sdate = #{sdate} ORDER BY sdate ASC, seqno ASC
